channel.title: favorite on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in favorite on Barefoot Rob

item.title: walked around with Lin
item.description: 14:37 Sunday 14 July 2019 JST Lin and I walked around our neighborhood, which couulllddd possibly count as a Walk that I started doing last year and dropped after getting to 14 or so. During this walk, I practiced a process I heard on an Esther Hicks video recently. “You’re my favorite rock. You’re my favorite leaf. You’re my favorite tree.” etc I found the transcription at the bottom of this PDF from a church newsletter(?
